string-array.item: Healthy brocolli soup for the real healthy people. Items needed for this delicious dish: - Brocolli - Sour cream - Maizena - Cucumber
Walnut and yoghurt with honey. Delicious after dinner snack. Items needed for this dish are: - Greek yoghurt - Walnuts or regular nuts - Honey
Roast chicken with vegetables. This is a simple and delicious land meal. Ingrediënts needed: - Chicken breast - Brocolli - Carrots - Colliflour - Butter
Salmon with asparagus. This light meal is great for a lunch. Items needed for this meal: - Fresh salmon - Asparagus - Lemon - Vegetables - Salt - Pepper
Vegan pasta for the real vegetarians amons us. For this dish the following items are needed: - Wheat pasta - Green peppers - Red peppers - Olives - Tomatos - Salt - Pepper
Vegan tortilla. A nice and juicy tortilla without any meat! Ingrediënts needed: - Wraps - Tomatos - Salad - Cucumber - Avocado - Red peppers
